attributes.comment:
As a prospective adoptive parent, I disagree with the proposed increase in the
USCIS fees. The fees for the I-600 have increased significantly in the past 10
years. These fee increases should be sufficient to cover the costs associated
with the processing of the I-600. If the USCIS is looking to increase funds in
general, then they should look toward increasing fees for other services and keep
the fees needed to process the I-600 stable.

These increases do nothing for prospective parents but add to the stress and
burden that we are going through to create our families. Seek other ways to raise
money for your agency.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Alexa Knight
